name: Kitsune Run
description:
This is a cute side-scroller game about a kitsune who got hungry and decided to go to the human world to eat all the fried tofu she can. Problem is, she needs to get back in time before the portal closes. Help her eat her fill so that she can go home, and beat your own personal best time!

CONTROLS

Arrow keys for movement

Spacebar for jumps and actions

NOTES

This is the first game I have ever made, so I apologize if it is too simple  or rough.

All artwork and music was done by me. They might be very simple, but I really enjoy working on them!

You can find the working video on my youtube channel.
